org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.equipment

Interface EquipmentInventory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CarriedInventory<ArmorEquipable>, Inventory, java.lang.Iterable<Inventory>, Nameable, OrderedInventory

    public interface EquipmentInventory
extends OrderedInventory, CarriedInventory<ArmorEquipable>
    Equipment inventory for Carriers that can carry equipment.
